title: wine_Masies_d'Avinyo_2002_Abadal_Selecció_Red_(Pla_de_Bages)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 81990.
country: Spain.
description: Serious wines from a tiny inland appellation in Catalonia—that's Abadal, a maker of true terroir wines that succeed way more often than they disappoint. This blend of Cab Sauvignon, Cab Franc and Syrah is minerally and full of red fruit and vanilla aromas. The palate is husky but correct, with full tannins, a kick of acidity and pure, ripe berry flavors. Even from a tough vintage it justifies its selected status..
designation: Abadal Selecció.
points: 91.
price: 49.0.
province: Catalonia.
region_1: Pla de Bages.
region_2: .
taster_name: Michael Schachner.
taster_twitter_handle: @wineschach.
title: Masies d'Avinyo 2002 Abadal Selecció Red (Pla de Bages).
